TopicTitle: Build a Sentence... One Word at a Time!

Articles.Content:
Rosalyn calvined Susie

Spoiler

Example: Rosalyn calvined Susie with a snow ball and rushed for the goal tree.

Sorry but the sentence was restructured yesterday and has moved on to the form prior to your post. Returning to the prior corrected form and continuing:

Rosalyn and Calvin chased Moe

———

for clarity:

072305112025

oh ya new page too 073605112024

Edited May 11 by AlamoVampire

@AlamoVampire

You restructured the sentence without discussing it first. What I wrote did make sense if given a chance to develope.

You also added 4 words to your original without words from any other player inbetween. Essentially you are playing with yourself.

If you were the creator of the thread or a moderator then it may be acceptable. But you keep making these changes without any democratic process.

I would like to play a fair game where all get an equal input and any changes are only done by the thread creator.

If this is not something that you can accept then I cannot continue in this game.

@ColdJ not publicly debating you. My pm says it all. So, to the rest of us sentence stands at:

Rosalyn and Calvin chased Moe
 

———

restated here for ease of viewing and further additions.

075005112024

one public comment on: “You also added 4 words to your original without words from any other player in between“ there were posts made by users between additions. The rules do not say either way but, a post with no new addition to a current sentence can be seen unless otherwise stated (yes this includes this post and the one above) as blanks or extra spaces, thus permitting new entries to be added with those spaces removed in proper grammatical formatting.

075505112024

@AlamoVampire a word here wasn't given a chance to develop, I for one am quite curious to see how it turns out.

11 hours ago, ColdJ said:

I would like to play a fair game where all get an equal input and any changes are only done by the thread creator.

As the thread creator, I say I'm in favor of this. It should be up to the people whose job it is to fix things to fix things.

Sorry but i wholly disagree and my pm explains why. Recorrecting and ending to start a new.

Cows eat

From now on, we are avoiding themed sentences. Historically, they've been this thread's number one source of trouble.

Cows eat veritable

Cows eat veritable grass poignantly
